name: First MonoGame The RPG
description:
our first big school project.

Move with arrow keys.
Spell are Q,W,E
normal attack 'space'
Loot it 'f'
Open inventory 'i'
Open character 'p'
in inventory right mouse click on item to equipped

sell item in inventory 'k' and after right mouse click
press the 'k' again to turn off sell.
